message.body: $TSLA with 35% battery cost reduction Cross the board at GF1 what happen to the profit and cash burn shorts ?!! https://electrek.co/2017/02/18/tesla-battery-cost-gigafactory-model-3/amp/

links.title: Tesla is now claiming 35% battery cost reduction at 'Gigafactory 1' - hinting at breakthrough cost below $125/kWh
links.description: Recent studies show that average electric vehicle battery cost dropped 80% in 6 years down to ~$227/kWh. It's exciting progress for the electric vehicle industry, but it's still not enough to make long-range electric cars affordable.

links.title: Will Tesla Become More Valuable Than Ford?
links.description: Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ: TSLA) trades near an all-time high of $280. With earnings upcoming next week, strong results could make its shares surge again. Its market cap of nearly $44 billion is only slightly below the market cap of Ford Motor Co. (NYSE: F), one of the world's largest car companies, which sits at $49.5 billion.

message.body: $TSLA could be hinting the Model 3 is coming faster than ex | EVANNEX Aftermarket Tesla Accessories https://evannex.com/blogs/news/spy-video-tesla-could-be-hinting-the-model-3-is-coming-faster-than-expected

links.title: Spy Video: Tesla could be hinting the Model 3 is coming faster than expected
links.description: As Tesla [NASDAQ: TSLA] is scheduled to report its fourth quarter earnings next week, all eyes (and ears) will be on the Model 3. Marketwatch* reports that, "Wall Street will be eager to hear details on the Model 3, the all-electric mass-market car that Chief Executive Elon Musk hopes to start producing in July and selling later this year."
